body: Cause I'm at a Quintus match and it has lasted for longer than an hour.

title: Is there a Nebula match time limit?

replies.body: I'm pretty sure there's a 90 minute limit on some. Not sure about others though
replies.body_tagged: I'm pretty sure there's a 90 minute limit on some. Not sure about others though

replies.body:
I looked in the yml file and there isn't a time lock, so the map would't end untill all monuments are broke of one team. 
Quintus: http://prntscr.com/3ymzt5
Bleened Rings: http://prntscr.com/3yn07t
